snippet.title: Movierooms - Cinema Management Preview
snippet.description:
Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2473820/Movierooms

Movierooms is a PC management tycoon game (indiegame in development) where the player manages their cinema theater. From the 1900s until today, they will take part in the management of their establishment from film programming to choosing the ads, maintaining their rooms and structures, managing their employees, or even customer satisfaction. But Movierooms stands out from the typical tycoon games by offering an authentic experience throughout history, giving the player the chance to live the biggest challenges of this gigantic industry, such as the arrival of TV, war, illegal streaming, on-demande TV... A fun approach to Cinema history, technological and cultural evolution, as well as the renowned people who helped to make Cinema what it is today.

Our social networks: https://linktr.ee/madpumpkins
Thank you!
